prea.util
Class SimpleEvaluationMetrics

java.lang.Object
  prea.util.SimpleEvaluationMetrics

public class SimpleEvaluationMetrics
extends java.lang.Object

A simplified version of evaluation metrics class. It deals only with MAE and RMSE, and ignores unexisting items.

Since:
2012. 5. 16
Version:
1.1
Author:
Joonseok Lee
